title: Searching for zopa font.
content:
Pls, I’m trying to find some font looks exactly same like font in zopa logo ( [http://www.zopa.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202204419/http:/www.zopa.com/ "http://www.zopa.com")). I found similar fonts, but I need exactly this face, doesn’t know?

 [‹ Design Example Needed - School/Learning Related](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202204419/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36528 "Go to previous forum topic") [Underlining ordinals ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202204419/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36551 "Go to next forum topic")
author: expes

comments.content:
The font used in the site I think is [AG Book Rounded Medium](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202204419/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/ag-book-bq-rounded/), so I guess that the Zopa logo is probably custom made based on that font.

By the way, the [Type ID Board](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202204419/http:/typophile.com/forum/29) is a better and faster place for this kind of questions.
